message: Looks like my original replies were removed. Wasn't there, but this man could had not """"went there"""" with the hateful speech. That stuff is never welcome. The lady may not be 100% innocent, but there are better ways of handling conflict than how he did. Some folks need to show more compassion and kindness!

I sit with my grandson at lunch time and there is so much food left overs. At his school there is a lady that collects unused milk, juices and sealed rolls and meals that are sealed that the children don't even open. His school would never turn away any children asking for food or even asking for extra food. So I just don't understand why they don't give the food to children that are hungry at her school.
